message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value and features, I'm proposing a starting price of $16,000.  I'm confident you'll find this to be a fair offer.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate you countering. I'm willing to negotiate, but $10,000 is significantly below its true worth. How about we meet halfway at $13,000? This reflects the product's value while still offering you a competitive price.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $13,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $11,000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm really interested in this product, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.
